import React from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import './Navbar.css' const Navbar = () => { let currentPage = useLocation() currentPage = currentPage.pathname.substring(1); currentPage = currentPage.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + currentPage.slice(1) console.log(currentPage) return (
